2164.subject: CHHS
2164.course_title_long: Professional Communication for the Health & Human Services Professions
2164.descrlong:
Develops writing and oral communication skills to increase competency in the health or human services professions. Builds confidence in writing for argumentation, applied research, advocacy, and reports. Students learn about themselves as writers, which assists them in the development of personal and professional writing and speaking skills. Complements other critical thinking courses offered in the major.

[Prereq: (GE Areas A1 and A2 and A3) and (Junior or Senior Standing)]
